00038 AccountsTab::AccountsTab(QWidget *parent, const char *name)
00039     : QWidget(parent,name)
00040 {
00041     accountsData = AccountsData::instance();
00042 
00043     main.vBoxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this, 0, -1, "accountsTab::main.vBoxLayout");
00044     main.vBoxLayout->setMargin(5);
00045     main.vBoxLayout->setSpacing(5);
00046     
00047     main.labelLayout = new QHBoxLayout(main.vBoxLayout, -1, "accountsTab::main.labelLayout");
00048     main.topLabel = new GlobalGoBackLabel(this, "accountsTab::main.topLabel");
00049     connect(main.topLabel, SIGNAL(goBack()), this, SIGNAL(switchToHome()));
00050     main.labelLayout->addWidget(main.topLabel);
00051     main.labelLayout->addStretch();
00052 
00053     main.dataTable = new AccountsTable(this, "accountsTab::main.dataTable");
00054     connect(main.dataTable, SIGNAL(switchToHome()), this, SIGNAL(switchToHome()));
00055     connect(main.dataTable, SIGNAL(switchToJournal()), this, SIGNAL(switchToJournal()));
00056     connect(main.dataTable, SIGNAL(switchToReports()), this, SIGNAL(switchToReports()));
00057     connect(main.dataTable, SIGNAL(switchToHelp()), this, SIGNAL(switchToHelp()));
00058     main.dataTable->installEventFilter(this);
00059    
00060     main.vBoxLayout->addWidget(main.dataTable);
00061     
00062     main.bottomWidget = new QWidget(this, "accountsTab::main.bottomWidget");
00063     main.bottomHBoxLayout = new QHBoxLayout(main.bottomWidget, 0, -1, "accountsTab::main.bottomHBoxLayout");
00064     
00065     main.bottomLabel = new QLabel(
00066             "<nobr><b>Keyboard Control:</b></nobr><br>"
00067             "<nobr> &nbsp; &nbsp; <b>Enter</b>: Edit current field</nobr><br>"
00068             "<nobr> &nbsp; &nbsp; <b>Insert</b> / <b>Delete</b>: Create new account / "
00069             "Delete selected account</nobr>",
00070             main.bottomWidget, "accountsTab::main.bottomLabel");
00071     
00072     main.bottomRightFrame = new QFrame(main.bottomWidget, "accountsTab::main.bottomRightFrame");
00073     main.bottomRightBoxLayout = new QBoxLayout(main.bottomRightFrame, QBoxLayout::LeftToRight,
00074                                                0, -1, "accountsTab::main.bottomRightBoxLayout");
00075     main.bottomRightBoxLayout->setSpacing(5);
00076     
00077     main.importButton = new QPushButton(
00078             QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/import.png") ),
00079             "Import from CSV (F11)", main.bottomRightFrame, "accountsTab::main.importButton");
00080     main.importButton->setFocusPolicy(QWidget::NoFocus);
00081     connect(main.importButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(importCSV()));
00082     
00083     main.exportButton = new QPushButton(
00084             QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/export.png") ),
00085             "Export to CSV (F12)", main.bottomRightFrame, "accountsTab::main.exportButton");
00086     main.exportButton->setFocusPolicy(QWidget::NoFocus);
00087     connect(main.exportButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(exportCSV()));
00088     
00089     main.bottomRightBoxLayout->addWidget(main.importButton, 0, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00090     main.bottomRightBoxLayout->addWidget(main.exportButton, 0, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00091     
00092     main.bottomHBoxLayout->addWidget(main.bottomLabel);
00093     main.bottomHBoxLayout->addStretch();
00094     main.bottomHBoxLayout->addWidget(main.bottomRightFrame);
00095     
00096     main.vBoxLayout->addWidget(main.bottomWidget);
00097 }
00098 
00099 void AccountsTab::importCSV()
00100 {
00101     if(ImportExport::importCSV(ImportExport::Accounts))
00102         main.dataTable->populate();
00103 }
00104 
00105 void AccountsTab::exportCSV()
00106 {
00107     ImportExport::exportCSV(ImportExport::Accounts);
00108 }
00109 
00110 void AccountsTab::chooseREAccount()
00111 {
00112 }
00113 
00114 bool AccountsTab::eventFilter(QObject *target, QEvent *event)
00115 {
00116     if(event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress)
00117     {
00118         QKeyEvent *keyEvent = (QKeyEvent*)event;
00119         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F8
00120            && accountsData->getREAccountId() == QString(""))
00121         {
00122             chooseREAccount();
00123             return true;
00124         }
00125         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F11)
00126         {
00127             importCSV();
00128             return true;
00129         }
00130         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F12)
00131         {
00132             exportCSV();
00133             return true;
00134         }
00135     }
00136     
00137     return QWidget::eventFilter(target,event);
00138 }  
00139 
00140 void AccountsTab::showEvent(QShowEvent*)
00141 {
00142     main.dataTable->setFocus();
00143 }
